title: Brand New PC but bad fps.
body: So Hello riot team.I recently got a new pc which had aroun 170fps most of the time on maximum graphics and has never gone below 130 fps.The problem is now that i record videos i have 60-30 fps.At first i was like of im gonna lower the graphics but it did not work.I have the latest drivers for my video card.Now it has gone so bad that even if i am not recording it sometimes goes as low as 30 fps.I am requesting for help.Thank you in advance.

replies.body: I'd first make sure to check for any graphics cards updates you might have missed for that new pc, but also be sure to check for things like the Game DVR that Windows updates can forcibly turn back on. That feature has been known to cause a number of fps issues for League.

It still has some problems.And the worst thing is sometimes when im lucky it goes from 150 to 60 but it freezes for less than half a second.Nvidia released a new driver today for my gpu and it seems that it fixed the problem somewhat.
